featured.text: To prevent the spread of the Ebola virus from West Africa to the rest of the world, many airports have begun Ebola ______ for passengers from the infected areas.

definition.zh_def: 受到病原體（如細菌或病毒）影響而導致疾病的。
definition.en_def: Affected by a pathogen, such as bacteria or viruses, causing disease.
definition.example: He was infected with the flu virus last winter.
